:orphan:

.. title:: gauge documentation


###################
gauge documentation
###################

gauge is a small widget to use with displayio capable boards.

gauge is to be used with CircuitPython as some of the behind the curtains methods are
in the CircuitPython core and could differ from MicroPython or Python

==============
